author: kevin
msg: Add the ability to pass suboptions to 'svn diff'.  This can now be
accomplished using svn diff -x "-u -B -b -w", svn diff --extensions="-u -B -b
diff.c(svn_cl__printf_file_diff): Pass options to GNU Diff.
diff-cmd.c(svn_cl__diff): Extract diff options from opt_state->extensions,
util.c(svn_cl__stringlist_to_array): New function to separate a white
space separated list of items into an apr_array_header_t.
main.c(main): Add 'extensions' option to options, and handle it.
This mostly fixes issue 422, except for the comment about server-side diffs.

completes, don't bump revision numbers on items scheduled for
